markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Oni](/Traits.aspx?ID=303)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 309 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Oni are a family of fiends who dwell on the Material Plane and take monstrous forms based on humanoid shapes.
name: Oni
